titles: Londons disease, and cure: being a soveraigne receipt against the plague, for prevention sake. / By John Qvarles, philo-medicus.
author: Quarles, John, 1624-1665.
publisher: Printed by Edward Crowch, dwelling on Snow-hill,
notes: Verse: "THere's none so ignorant, I hope, but knowes ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
keywords: Plague --  England --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
